website_summaries.verdict: An elegant shaving soap bowl that works well and is easy to clean.
pros: Shallow and wide, making it easy to mix up a good lather
cons: Some have said the lid doesn't fit that well

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appearance, terrible design
customer_reviews.text: After the second use of this shaving bowl, it became completely useless. The seal is so tight that the knob on the top came off from me trying to open the bowl. Apparently, lots of people have had similar experiences from this Apollo product. Unacceptable.

I wanted a NICE, decorative and elegant looking shaving bowl to display on my counter with the other "manly" things like a double edge razor and shaving brush and straight razor. THis looks nice, but just isn't quite what I wanted or expected.

Love the cover to hide what is left uncleaned like most men would do. The etching is a nice touch. It's a bit expensive like all men's shaving products today, but hey, polished steel and an elegant design for those expensive shaving soap pucks!

customer_reviews.text: Now I understand why there were a couple comments about the product cracking. It's steel, why would it crack? The lid was so tight I had to force it in. Now I can't get it out without using pliers or some other tool. I'm afraid of damaging the lid or ripping the knob off with any attempt to pry it open. Returning. I give it two stars because it looks nice but it's non functional. Apollo seems to have trouble getting their products to fit they way they should. Their stand doesn't fit the brush quite right (see other comments) and now this. I'm wondering if I should just return the brush too since quality control seems to evade them.
customer_reviews.author: kaiser rolls

customer_reviews.title: Keep your soap moist and dust free
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality, the lid seals well, hence keeping the soap from drying out. I use it to store my shaving soap rather then using it as a lathering bowl. Top notch quality, the picture doesn't do justice, it is more stainless steel look with a great luster and shine, not aluminumish as it looks in their picture.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, don't settle for anything else. Keeps my soap moist between shaves. I'm a beginner at this type of shaving, I purchased the bowl and apollo brush and razor stand, very solid with good weight. The lifetime warranty is what sold me. Very good products.

customer_reviews.text: Wish it had some type of non-slip coating on the bottom of the jar otherwise it works perfectly. I squeeze out my tube soaps into it so I can use my brush. Good price for the quality.
